thread.title: Panasonic announces OLED pricing, affordable in two to three years
thread.title_full: Panasonic announces OLED pricing, affordable in two to three years

title: Panasonic announces OLED pricing, affordable in two to three years
text: Panasonic announces OLED pricing, affordable in two to three years Saturday, 5 September 2015 (28 minutes ago) While the price tag on Panasonic's first 4K OLED television is incredibly steep, the potential for price reductions over the next few years due to increased competition may bring OLED to the average consumer.
